divs: Sighting DetailsWe were house sitting on the North East side of Tucson and a bright star was going very slowly straight up. I noticed it rising above reddington pass so I started filming it. Check these out!
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Tucson
There was one other sighting in Tucson on or around August 28th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
Summary: Bright Star going straight up again
